1.content: First of all. Are you male or female?
1.title: The start

11.content:
A yawn flushed from your mouth as you opened the cupboard for some cereal.
"Heeeey!" a voice cheered in the background. Startled, you spun around- not expecting to seea tall blonde, blue eyed girl wearing hotpants and a stripped t shirt

Aka, your friend Taylor.
"Morning... wait, what are you doing here?" You asked, eyeing your cereal suspiciously. Taylor was a good friend but would always go overboard with her pranks, you were finally getting used to them though which seemed to make her pout. Pointing the box of cereal at her, you opened the box, springing out a fake snake.

Taylor dodged it with a small grin,
"Damn! You are getting good at this! I'm going to have to up the anti!" She laughed, hopping over happily.
"Please don't, your last big prank almost made me pass out" You looked a little annoyed, pouring out your cereal. Taylor grinned, a sigh flooded from your mouth as you dumped your cereal in the bin, "What was in the cereal...?"

Taylor swung her arms harmlessly "Uh- might of been like... some ghost pepper" She innocently spoke.

She was always like this, it used to get to you but her odd pranks actually started to make life interesting and she always secretly had your back. As shown by her putting the emergency milk on the counter. You actually managed to avoid her pranks for the past two months, she was like an open book to you and you were confident that you could avoid her pranks.

So, you made what would be the worst idea you've ever made. You bet that you could go a week avoiding her pranks and you were about to win. Obviously there were some rules, she couldn't just run over and toss water over you.

The first few days went pretty well. Taylor was too calm for her standards only ocasionally trying to prank you with a whoopie cushion or drink that you refused to take. It was almost friday and you could already taste the victory over your friend. Taylor helped your family to organize the flea market that would be running om the weekend. You of course had an eye over taylor not wanting to get pranked. After a little while your sister approached you holding a bottle of coke im both hands. "You want one bro?" She said stretching her right arm out towards you. You looked towards taylor as she glanced over to you two and smirked. "No thank you sis i will rather drink my water" you replied as you reached out for your cup of fresh cold water. You couldnt taste any suspicious liquid in it so you thought you were safe. You went back into your room as you suddenly broke down in your room. After you woke up you were...
11.title: Male

choices: Lara 18 big goth girl with piercings
Chloe 21 was heading to the gym
111.content:
You woke up laying on the floor. You heard how your door swung open. You felt chilly as you saw your sister above you. She was standing weird, right above you so you could saw under her rock shes wearing. You felt very uncomfortable but you couldnt look somewhere else. "Hm my bro surely doesn't need everything that is in here" she said as she started taking things from your room. She took things that were very close to you like your console, your favorite shirt and more. You tried to yell that she should stop, but she doesn't hear you.

After the box was full she was about to leave but then she looked straight at you. Only now you realised how small you actually were. Her hand grabbed you as you got put into the box. She made her way to her car as she puts her stuff she would in it and drove off. You started to panic as you didnt know what the hell is happening. After what seems to be hours your sister arrived at the flea market. She already had her area ready to go. She took the items on the table. She put you in a bowel with the label "1$" above it and moved on. You looked around seeing multiple socks, underwear and bras in them. Slowly you noticed whats going on."am i...socks?" You thought to yourself as suddenly a person stood next to you
111.title: Pair of socks

113.content: You were in the middle off your room as a pair of converse. You couldnt move or scream for help. Your sis came into your room "broo....brooo where are you..huh converse? My bro never worn any converse..they look like quite new. I think he wont miss them" she said as she grabbed you with hee finger and took you out of the room. You screamed and screamed for help to your sis but it all vanished in your head as she places you on the table with the rest of the stuff. You couldnt calm down, you didnt want to get sold off to a stranger and being theyre converse forever and each look a person gave you made your heart beat faster until..
113.title: A paiŕ of shoes

info.brief_description: Thanks to a prank you got turned into an object at the worst time possible
info.description:
Your sister is going to a flea market. She looks trough the whole house for stuff to sell. Your friends had the bright idea to mix a transformation potion into your drink, now your sister is gonna sell you.

Rules:
No death
Keep it unaware
No sudden end
